attributes.action: Anyone diagnosed with chronic illness/fibromyalgia don't have to be reassessed
attributes.background: Nobody with a diagnosed chronic illness or fibromyalgia should have to suffer going through the pip assessment ever again. They should all receive the full payment. Other illness don't have to be assessed at all. Chronic illnesses/fibromyalgia don't go away. Doctors need to recognise chronic illness

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

If you want the UK Government to improve understanding & treatment of people with hidden illnesses, including fibromyalgia in the PIP process, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/129454
